# HMCharacteristicValueSecuritySystemAlarmType.unknown

**Case**

An alarm has been triggered with an unknown cause.

## Declaration

```swift
case unknown
```

## Alarm Types

- **HMCharacteristicValueSecuritySystemAlarmType.noAlarm**: The alarm isn’t triggered.
title: HMCharacteristicValueSecuritySystemAlarmType.unknown
